revised_title: Mechanism of Initiation and Propagation of Detonation in Solid Explosives
tldr: This article investigates the mechanism of detonation in solid explosives, focusing on the initiation and propagation of detonation waves. The authors discuss the limitations of classical mechanical theories and propose a new approach to understanding the behavior of high explosives. They develop a method to test the sensitivity of explosive compositions using fall hammer tests and analyze the results to gain insights into the factors contributing to detonation.
